about_the_game:
Dive into the pixelated universe of Harvester of the Dead, an action-platformer game inspired by Metroidvania!

Discover a dark story where you must explore various environments and seal the great gate of hell.

Along the way, prepare to face fantastic creatures, improve your skills, and become the legendary Harvester of the Dead.

Key Features:

  • Explore different environments throughout your journey to close the gates of hell!

  • Find all the rifts to hell and recover the keys to seal the great gate.

  • Alternate between platforming phases and intense combat.

  • Fight zombies, undead, and other creatures in randomly generated dungeons.

  • Use melee weapons, ranged weapons, or magical weapons.

  • Battle huge bosses in randomly generated rifts to hell!

  • Gain experience, level up, and unlock new skills.

  • Customize your character from the start: appearance and clothing!

  • Help NPCs by completing their quests and gain new equipment, or visit the shop to upgrade your character!

  • Experience an epic atmosphere with a captivating orchestral soundtrack!
